pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![version](https://badge.fury.io/py/gitlabform.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/gitlabform)![release date](https://img.shields.io/github/release-date/gitlabform/gitlabform)[![Downloads](https://static.pepy.tech/badge/gitlabform/month)](https://pepy.tech/project/gitlabform)[![code style](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/psf/black)[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/gitlabform/gitlabform/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=NOMttkpB2A)](https://codecov.io/gh/gitlabform/gitlabform)[![gitlabform](https://snyk.io/advisor/python/gitlabform/badge.svg)](https://snyk.io/advisor/python/gitlabform)üèó GitLabForm is a specialized configuration as a code tool for GitLab projects, groups and moreusing hierarchical configuration written in YAML.Please see the project site for more information.
